alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Colquitt; Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Grady, northern Thomas, west central Brooks and southwestern Colquitt Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ochlocknee, or near Thomasville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Grady Co A/p, Autreyville, Dillon, Enon, Patten, Merrillville, Chastain, Dawesville, Moultrie Municipal A/P, Pine Park, Hollis, Pasco and Murphy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.
